user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
last_action: click on the search icon (a magnifying glass) located at the middle and upper part of the screen.
reflect_result:
By clicking on the search icon (a magnifying glass), you have now accessed the search bar. This action enables you to type a query, which is an essential step to search for the desired product, such as USB-B, to add to your cart on Walmart. 

Although this action moves you closer to completing the user request, the next step would involve entering "USB-B" into the search bar and selecting the appropriate product to add to the cart.
